alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 16 at 3:06PM CDT until April 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 434...435...436...437. The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Sunday afternoon through Sunday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 434. Fire weather zone 435. Fire weather zone 436. Fire weather zone 437. * WIND...Wind gusts from the west to northwest 20-25 mph gusts 40-50 mph. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity between 15-20% * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions may develop. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
